/* 일정을 조회 한다. */ SELECT USR_ID , SCHD_SEQ , SCHD_YMD_ST, TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( REPLACE(SCHD_YMD_ED, '-',CHR(10)) +1 ), 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) SCHD_YMD_ED, /* 종료일 + 1 을 해야 정상적으로 그려짐*/ SCHD_CONTENTS FROM PRS4000 WHERE USR_ID = #usrId#
AND REPLACE(SCHD_YMD_ST,'-',CHR(10)) >= REPLACE(#startDt#,'-',CHR(10)) AND REPLACE(SCHD_YMD_ED,'-',CHR(10)) <= REPLACE(#endDt#,'-',CHR(10))
sqlMap.update:
/* prs4000DAO.updatePrs4000SchdInfo 일정 수정 */
UPDATE PRS4000 SET SCHD_YMD_ST = #startDt# , SCHD_YMD_ED = #endDt# , MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, MODIFY_USR_ID = #usrId#, MODIFY_USR_IP = #usrIp#
, SCHD_CONTENTS = #schdContents#
WHERE USR_ID = #usrId# AND SCHD_SEQ = #schdSeq#

DELETE FROM PRS4000 WHERE USR_ID = #usrId# AND SCHD_SEQ = #schdSeq#
